original_text: But even if I made you sad by my letter, I am not sorry about that. At one time, I was sorry that I had written it. I saw that my letter had made you sad. But you were sad only for a short time.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 편지로 너희를 근심하게 한 것을 후회하였으나 지금은 후회하지 아니함은 그 편지가 너희로 잠시만 근심하게 한 줄을 앎이라

sentences.original_text: But even if I made you sad by my letter
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 내 편지로 당신을 슬프게 만들었다면

sentences.original_text: I am not sorry about that
At one time, I was sorry
I saw that my letter had made you sad
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 편지가 당신을 슬프게 만들었다는 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: But you were sad only for a short time
